meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Basia Pioro Chris O'Toole Jason Shore Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6491.

td.p: Basia Pioro, a development manager from George Town, Grand Cayman
Chris O'Toole, a writer from Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania
Jason Shore, a medical student from Plano, Texas (whose 3-day cash winnings total $67,800)

tr.td: (Alex: You have to identify the play for us.)
(Sarah: There's more to reef fish than a lot of pretty colors.)

div.h3: Scores at the end of the Double Jeopardy! Round:

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_FJ', 'clue_FJ_stuck', '
BasiaWhat is counter cultu

ChrisWhat is going against the grain?

JasonWhat is ----------
$3,800
politically incorrect')
